verses.verse: I <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H136>LORD<s%> <S%H5324>standing<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5221>Smite<s%> the <S%H3730>lintel<s%> of the door, that the <S%H5592>posts<s%> may <S%H7493>shake:<s%> and <S%H1214>cut<s%> them in the <S%H7218>head,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them; and I will <S%H2026>slay<s%> the <S%H319>last<s%> of them with the <S%H2719>sword:<s%> he that <S%H5127>flees<s%> of them shall not <S%H5127>flee<s%> away, and he that <S%H6412>escapes<s%> of them shall not be <S%H4422>delivered.<s%>

<S%H3588>Though<s%> <S%H518><s%> they <S%H2864>dig<s%> into <S%H7585>hell,<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> shall my <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> them; <S%H3588>though<s%> <S%H518><s%> they <S%H5927>climb<s%> up to <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> will I <S%H3381>bring<s%> them <S%H3381>down:<s%>

And <S%H3588>though<s%> <S%H518><s%> they <S%H2244>hide<s%> themselves in the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H3760>Carmel,<s%> I will <S%H2664>search<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> them out <S%H8033>there;<s%> and <S%H3588>though<s%> <S%H518><s%> they be <S%H5641>hid<s%> from my <S%H5869>sight<s%> in the <S%H7172>bottom<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> will I <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H5175>serpent,<s%> and he shall <S%H5391>bite<s%> them:

And <S%H3588>though<s%> <S%H518><s%> they <S%H3212>go<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> will I <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and it shall <S%H2026>slay<s%> them: and I will <S%H7760>set<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> on them for <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and not for <S%H2896>good.<s%>

And the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is he that <S%H5060>touches<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and it shall <S%H4127>melt,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein shall <S%H56>mourn:<s%> and it shall <S%H5927>rise<s%> up <S%H3605>wholly<s%> like a <S%H2975>flood;<s%> and shall be <S%H8248>drowned,<s%> as by the <S%H2975>flood<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

It is he that <S%H1129>builds<s%> his <S%H4609>stories<s%> in the <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and has <S%H3245>founded<s%> his <S%H92>troop<s%> in the <S%H776>earth;<s%> he that <S%H7121>calls<s%> for the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and <S%H8210>pours<s%> them out on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is his <S%H8034>name.<s%>

Are you not as <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H3569>Ethiopians<s%> to me, O <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%> Have not I <S%H5927>brought<s%> up <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt?<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> from <S%H3731>Caphtor,<s%> and the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> from <S%H7024>Kir?<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> are on the <S%H2401>sinful<s%> <S%H4467>kingdom,<s%> and I will <S%H8045>destroy<s%> it from <S%H5921>off<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth;<s%> <S%H657>saving<s%> that I will not utterly <S%H8045>destroy<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

For, <S%H2009>see,<s%> I will <S%H6680>command,<s%> and I will <S%H5128>sift<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> like as corn is <S%H5128>sifted<s%> in a <S%H3531>sieve,<s%> yet shall not the least <S%H6872>grain<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H2400>sinners<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> which <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H7451>evil<s%> shall not <S%H5066>overtake<s%> nor <S%H6923>prevent<s%> us.

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> will I <S%H6965>raise<s%> up the <S%H5521>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> that is <S%H5307>fallen,<s%> and <S%H1443>close<s%> up the <S%H6556>breaches<s%> thereof; and I will <S%H6965>raise<s%> up his <S%H2034>ruins,<s%> and I will <S%H1129>build<s%> it as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old:<s%>

That they may <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H7121>called<s%> by my <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H2063>this.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that the <S%H2790>plowman<s%> shall <S%H5066>overtake<s%> the <S%H7114>reaper,<s%> and the <S%H1869>treader<s%> of <S%H6025>grapes<s%> him that <S%H4900>sows<s%> <S%H2233>seed;<s%> and the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> shall <S%H5197>drop<s%> <S%H6071>sweet<s%> <S%H6071>wine,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1389>hills<s%> shall <S%H4127>melt.<s%>

And I will <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and they shall <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H8074>waste<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and <S%H3427>inhabit<s%> them; and they shall <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H3196>wine<s%> thereof; they shall also <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H1593>gardens,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of them.

And I will <S%H5193>plant<s%> them on their <S%H127>land,<s%> and they shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> be <S%H5428>pulled<s%> up out of their <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> them, <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
